name: Fire
description: Elemental power associated with flames and heat.

name: Water
description: Elemental power associated with fluidity and the ability to flow.

name: Air
description: Elemental power associated with the atmosphere and the ability to move through it.

name: Earth
description: Elemental power associated with the ground, rocks, and soil.

name: Lightning
description: Elemental power associated with electricity and thunderbolts.

name: Ice
description: Elemental power associated with frozen water and low temperatures.

name: Nature
description: Elemental power associated with plants, animals, and the natural world.

name: Darkness
description: Elemental power associated with shadows, the absence of light, and the unknown.

name: Light
description: Elemental power associated with illumination and radiance.

name: Metal
description: Elemental power associated with the strength and hardness of metal.

name: Shadow
description: Elemental power associated with darkness, obscurity, and stealth.

name: Blood
description: Elemental power associated with the life force and vitality.

name: Lava
description: Elemental power associated with molten rock and extreme heat.

name: Crystal
description: Elemental power associated with the beauty and purity of crystals.

name: Poison
description: Elemental power associated with toxins and harmful substances.

name: Time
description: Elemental power associated with the passage and manipulation of time.

name: Space
description: Elemental power associated with the vastness and mysteries of space.

name: Gravity
description: Elemental power associated with the force of attraction between objects.

name: Sound
description: Ability to manipulate and control sound waves

name: Electricity
description: Ability to generate and manipulate electric currents

name: Plasma
description: Ability to manipulate ionized gas

name: Radiation
description: Ability to manipulate and emit various types of radiation

name: Magma
description: Ability to control and manipulate molten rock

name: Smoke
description: Ability to control and manipulate smoke and gas emissions

name: Steam
description: Ability to manipulate steam and water vapor

name: Void
description: Ability to manipulate and control the void or emptiness

name: Wind
description: Ability to manipulate and control the wind

name: Plantlife
description: Ability to control and manipulate plants and vegetation

name: Moon
description: Ability to control and manipulate the powers of the moon

name: Sun
description: Ability to control and manipulate the powers of the sun

name: Stars
description: Ability to control and manipulate the powers of the stars

name: Sand
description: Ability to manipulate and control sand and desert environments

name: Ash
description: Ability to manipulate and control ash and smoke

name: Quicksand
description: Ability to control and manipulate quicksand and similar substances

name: Frost
description: Ability to manipulate and control frost and ice

name: Acid
description: Ability to generate and manipulate acidic substances

name: Thunder
description: Ability to control and manipulate thunder and lightning

name: Psychic Energy
description: Ability to manipulate and generate psychic energy.

name: Dimensional Rift
description: Ability to open portals to other dimensions.

name: Cosmic Dust
description: Ability to manipulate the cosmic dust that makes up the universe.

name: Spirit
description: Ability to communicate with and manipulate spirits of the dead.

name: Gravity Waves
description: Ability to manipulate and generate gravitational waves.

name: Invisibility
description: Ability to render oneself invisible to the naked eye.

name: Psychokinesis
description: Ability to move objects with one's mind.

name: Luminosity
description: Ability to generate light and manipulate its intensity.

name: Chaos
description: Ability to manipulate chaos and disorder.

name: Magnetism
description: Ability to manipulate magnetic fields.

name: Antimatter
description: Ability to manipulate and generate antimatter.

name: Pulse
description: Ability to generate and manipulate energy pulses.

name: Gravity Flux
description: Ability to manipulate gravity and create gravitational anomalies.

name: Echolocation
description: Ability to navigate and perceive the environment using sound waves.

name: Photosynthesis
description: Ability to generate and store energy from sunlight.

name: Radiance
description: Ability to emit and control radiant energy.

name: Oblivion
description: Ability to manipulate the void and the absence of existence.

name: Memory
description: Ability to manipulate and erase memories.

name: Gravity Well
description: Ability to create and manipulate gravitational wells.

name: Nanobots
description: Ability to control and manipulate nanobots.

name: Nuclear Energy
description: Ability to manipulate and generate nuclear energy.

name: Psionics
description: Ability to manipulate and generate psionic energy.

name: Phase Shift
description: Ability to shift through different phases or dimensions, allowing them to become intangible or teleport through solid objects.
